Job Title: Assistant Controller

Location: Chandler, AZ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Assistant Controller – Behavioral Health Group – Chandler, AZ! 

One of Arizona’s leading behavioral health companies is seeking an Assistant Controller who can bring expertise to the team. The company is on a dramatic growth path with the strong demand for its unique product offerings, and offers exciting career opportunities. Interested? Your strong background in accounting combined with your interpersonal skills will help you to excel in this close-knit environment. Apply today to join, grow, and learn!

Who you are:

 Bachelor’s in Accounting, Finance, or similar field.  4-6+ years of accounting experience including financial reporting, lease accounting, and property accounting.  Excel guru with recent experience preparing financial statements within Excel.  Extensive ASC 842 experience.  CPA preferred, but not required. 


What you’ll do:

 Manage the financial reporting process including preparing 5 sets of financials each month.  Lead all lease accounting and property accounting including PP&E and fixed assets.  Debt reporting and ad-hoc reporting for various stakeholders.  System administrator for Sage Intacct. 


Why work here:

 High-growth environment: this company is rapidly expanding and is looking for people who can grow their headquarters practice!  Impact: influence results and make a positive impact on the team and company results – we’ll listen to your voice.  Culture: Great company dynamic and culture. The company cares about their employees and others! 


What does this position pay?

 Compensation is determined by several factors which may include skillset, qualifications/certifications, experience level, and geographic location.  The expected range for this role is 120-130K, annualized base compensation, with additional compensation components. Please note this range is an estimate and actual may vary based on qualifications and experience. 


Please send your resume to Emma at ebruno@provenrecruiting.com if you have the requisite qualifications and are interested in the opportunity.

Note: We actively support and promote people of various backgrounds, from race, religion and gender to geographical area, university, lifestyle, and personality type. Proven Recruiting is minority-owned, majority women, and is a strong advocate for diversity and inclusion in the broader community. Do not hesitate to apply now!

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
